gameworld

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameworld.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoltCutter, ChallengeItem, Coin, Diffuser, OxygenTank, Potion, SpaceShip

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents items within the game.
    Author:
    Latrell Whata 300417220

        public Item(int row,
            int col,
            java.lang.String direction)
        This constructor creates an item.
        Parameters:
        row - the row value of the tile the Item is located
        col - the column value of the tile the Item is located
        direction - the direction the Item is facing
